Player History
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/24/1983 to a 4-year deal worth $3,200,000 per year...
Released by Atlanta on 2/25/1983...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/2/1983 to a 1-year deal worth $668,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 4/3/1983...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/13/1985 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/4/1988 to a 2-year deal worth $12,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/18/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $12,000,000 per year...
